Graph/图¶

fibonacci sequence¶

斐波那契数列,也叫黄金分割数列:

0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, ...
seq[0] = 0
seq[1] = 1
seq[n] = seq[n-1] + seq[n-2] (n>=2)
